item.title: Adding an item?
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Gltich Legit Gltich
item.description:
@Legit_Gltich wrote:

Almost got my very simple mini game working, i just can get it to add an item at the end and the message to
send to all, probably just something dumb on my part

my code is

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2468) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="has just completed Chicken-Mini"; ppl.teleportToX = 3032; ppl.teleportToY = 3631; ppl.heightLevel = 0; addItem(1961, 1); }

Problem:

addItem(1961, 1); PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="has just completed Chicken-Mini";

i get an error message

NPCHandler.java:1264: cannot find symbol
symbol: Method additem(int,int)
location: class NPCHandler
additem(1961, 1)
^
                                  All help or any guesses are very much welcome and appreciated
                                                     ~Legit Gltich~

Read full topic
